General.Name: MITCON Consultancy & Engineering Services Limited
General.Description: MITCON Consultancy & Engineering Services Limited provides consultancy and training services in India. The company operates through Consultancy and Training, Project Services, and Wind Power Generation segments. It offers renewable power plants, including solar, wind, small hydro, bio- CNG, waste to energy, and bio fuels; smaller on-site facilities; and EPC for solar power project with or without energy storage, as well as pre-investment, EPCM, and O&M services for bio-origin industries. The company also provides advisory services on aspects ranging from technical, financial, and environmental issues to engineering design; clean air, water, land, biodiversity, green energy solutions, and climate change, as well as environmental, social, and governance (ESG) issues; and pre-feasibility studies, market assessment, go-to market strategies, detailed project reports, techno economic viability reports, lender engineer services, and owner engineer. In addition, it offers environmental services, including regulatory and statutory advisory, environment and social impact assessment, monitoring services, sustainability, EMS, CER, soil health, ZLD, ETP/CETP, MSW and other solid waste, and well-equipped laboratory; sustainability services, comprising carbon footprint assessment, carbon neutrality roadmap, life cycle assessment, and ESG, IR, CDP, and SDG reporting; and carbon credits services, such as project design, registration with appropriate registry, monitoring and issuance support, and trading of carbon credits. Further, the company provides skill development and capacity building; and infrastructure services for roads and bridges, urban infrastructure, railways, and water. The company was formerly known as MITCON Consultancy Services Limited and changed its name to MITCON Consultancy & Engineering Services Limited in October 2010. MITCON Consultancy & Engineering Services Limited was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Pune, India.

4.Name: Mr. Chandrashekhar  Bhosale
